alert.note: Alert for Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lake and southwestern Orange Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Horizon West, or near Winter Garden, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Ocoee, Winter Garden, Windermere and Bay Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
